CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(MRN__r.MRN_Delivery_Type__c, 'Import') , ( Total_Item_Value_In_INR_input__c + Custom_Duty_Amount__c)+ ( Total_Amount_Input__c * MRN__r.Exchange_Rate__c * MRN__r.dcCharges__c )+ ( Total_Amount_Input__c * MRN__r.Exchange_Rate__c * MRN__r.clgCharges__c ), Total_Item_Value_In_INR_input__c +(Total_Item_Value_In_INR_input__c * MRN__r.Total_Charges_Percentage__c ))
CustomField.label: Total Landed Amount (INR)
